title: PS5 Production Increased - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.15.20
description:
Greg's joined by the host of the Kinda Funny Xcast SnowBikeMike to talk about our brand new Xbox show, more PS5s being made, and the Paper Mario reviews! 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:17:15 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is LIVE answering all of your questions following the Ghost of Tsushima review!
This Saturday at 6 am pt, the Kinda Funny Xcast debuts on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services!
kindafunny.com/store has a bunch of great shit
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:18:48 - PlayStation’s Making More PS5’s, Takashi Mochizuki @ Bloomberg
00:28:50 - Paper Mario: The Origami King Review Round-Up
00:34:50 - Marvel’s Avengers’ Beta Dates, Dorno @ IGN
00:41:12 -  - Best Friends Q:Stephen Pina, Jr (stevejr1128)
00:45:45 - Video Game Industry Harassment Hotline, Ian Walker @ Kotaku
00:53:15 - Clowns -- literal clowns -- are protesting in Red Dead, Iain Harris PCGamesN
00:55:00 -  XCast
00:57:30 - Out today
00:59:25 - Squad Up:Frankfurtter(Quiz show) - Billythedoor
01:00:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
